title: Can't Creat a PBE account
body: Hi Riot I go to this sight to make my account which is step 3. i got the email and on my normal league it said i was accepted in a pop up window. so i went to the email download the client and realize that i still cant make an acc bc the link is still on step 2 but it says i was accepted is this glitch? PLZ HELP ME :) thx

replies.body:
I checked your account and it seems it must have been an initial bug when it displayed step 3. You haven't been accepted into the PBE just yet. :(

Let me know if you have any other questions.
So this email that i got was just a glitch? https://gyazo.com/0a03588a560630376b3b46de5020903f

It looks like this email is for the [Alpha Client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/206201070-Alpha-Client-FAQ), which is a completely different system than the PBE. You got accepted into the new client that will eventually replace the current one that refer to as the *Air* Client because it runs on Adobe Air.

It seems *that's* where the confusion began. At this point, you'll want to sit tight while you wait for PBE acceptance and continue to actively play League and be a positive influence. Let me know if you have any other questions.
